slide_problem.title: Current Problem

problem_1.title: Complexity
problem_1.text: The process of designing living spaces is exceedingly complex, demanding not only a deep understanding of a room's aesthetic and functional requirements but also a significant financial commitment.

problem_2.title: Creativity
problem_2.text: Interior design can often feel overwhelming due to its intricacies and the broad spectrum of decisions and options that must be considered.

problem_3.title: Expenses
problem_3.text: The considerable costs often discourage many individuals from seriously considering the remodeling or redesign of their living spaces.

slide_problem.summary: The interior design market lacks customer-friendly tools.

slide_solution.title: Our Solution

solution_1.title: Artificial Intelligence
solution_1.text: Intelligent design concepts provide a convenient and efficient way to obtain inspiring ideas for room design.

solution_2.title: Realtime Collaboration
solution_2.text: Modern technologies enable efficient and collaborative real-time collaboration between designers, clients, and stakeholders.

solution_3.title: Affordable
solution_3.text: Realizing design dreams without a high budget opens the door to a world of creative possibilities and innovations

slide_solution.summary: Interior design suggestions tailored to your needs with the simple click of a button.

feature_1.title: Chat Interaction
feature_1.message_text: Check out this dark modern living room, generated with Interiorly AI

technology_1.title: Clerk
technology_1.text: embeddable UIs, flexible APIs, and admin dashboards to authenticate and manage users.

technology_2.title: Trunk
technology_2.text: Automatically run a set of 100+ idiomatic static analyzers, linters, formatters, and security tools.

technology_4.title: Convex
technology_4.text: Fetch data and perform business logic with strong consistency by writing pure TypeScript.

technology_5.title: Edgestore
technology_5.text: Storage, CDN and a super easy to use type-safe library.

slide_vision.title: Our Vision
slide_vision.vision: Our goal is to become the premier destination for interior design, serving both businesses and individuals alike.

team_member_1.name: Julian Schmidt
team_member_1.text: Full Stack Developer. Founded Interiorly (formerly "RoomVision") in 2021. Passionate about AI and its applications in the real world.

team_member_2.name: Anthony Owah
team_member_2.text: Project Manager and (backend) Developer. Effectively coordinate complex projects while developing technical solutions to meet requirements and implement efficient systems.

step_1.title: Preliminary Study
step_1.text: Initiating a preliminary study to gather initial insights and evaluate feasibility prior to engaging in detailed analysis.

step_2.title: Rich-Text Editor
step_2.text: Notion like rich-text editor for users to express their design ideas.

step_3.title: Evolving User Experience through UI Implementation
step_3.text: Execute the design blueprint to bring the envisioned UI to life, ensuring seamless implementation and user-centric functionality.
